0.85x Reload scale then magazine is empty
relo_t_0 reload time reduced by relo_r_0

Ambitious Assassin.text: Increases magazine capacity by 10% per kill, maximizes at 50%.

Archer's Tempo.text:
On Precision Hit:
Sets drawtime to 440ms for 3 seconds.

Armor-Piercing Rounds.text: Rounds cause 5% extra damage to combatants shields and overpenetrate targets.

Assassin's Blade.text:
Kills increase Damage by 15%
And Sprint Speed by 13% for 5s

Auto-Loading Holster.text:
The holstered weapon is automatically reloaded
after 3 seconds.

Sets impact to 55 Rapid-Fire Fusion Rifle archetype.
Sets charge time to 460ms.
100 Handling when readied for 4 seconds.

Kills reload Magazine.

Clown Cartridge.text:
Randomly increases magazine between
10% to 50% on Reload. Always rounds up.

Cluster Bomb.text:
Rockets generate 8 additional Cluster Bombs on detonation.
Each bomb deals about 3% additional damage.

Counterattack.text: Blocking an attack immediately after Guarding increases Damage by 50% for 2s.

Death at First Glance.text:
First shot while ADS deals 33% increased Damage.
Bonus is Preserved:
On Precision / Elemental Shields Hits.
If lost, buff is regained after 3 seconds of not firing.

Demolitionist.text:
Kills restore Grenade Energy.
Primary and Heavy 10%
Energy 20%
Using Grenade Ability:
Reloads weapon. 3 Second Cooldown.

Desperado.text:
Reloading within 6 seconds after a Precision Kill:
increases your Rate of Fire to 600RPM for 7 seconds. Reduces damage against Combatants by 20%
Can be refreshed.

Disruption Break.text:
On Elemental / Barrier or Guardian shield break:
Applies a debuff that grants:
50% increased Kinetic Damage for 5.5 seconds.

Dragonfly.text:
Precision Kills explode the target
Dealing the Weapon's Elemental Damage over
3 meter radius.
Damage is not increased by Weapon Perks.
Dragonfly Spec grants 50% more damage and radius.
